segments.en: And today we're bringing you another great lesson about sports, part of our sports series.
segments.cn: 今天我们为您带来另一节关于体育的精彩课程，这是我们体育系列的一部分。

segments.en: And in this lesson we are talking about maybe the world's most favorite sport.
segments.cn: 在这节课中，我们将讨论世界上最受欢迎的运动之一。

segments.en: Right, one of the most popular sports in the world, soccer.
segments.cn: 对，世界上最受欢迎的运动之一，足球。

segments.en: Or also known as football in other countries.
segments.cn: 在其他国家也称为足球。

segments.en: Okay, so before we get started with this great lesson, let's take a look at some of the words we'll find in the dialogue in Vocabulary Preview.
segments.cn: 好的，在我们开始这节精彩的课程之前，让我们先看看在词汇预览中会遇到的一些单词。

segments.en: We're going to look at three words here.
Now, wingman isn't really related to soccer in any way.
segments.cn: 现在，wingman与足球没有任何关系。

segments.en: But it's a way of referring to somebody as your right hand.
segments.cn: 但它是指某人是你的得力助手。

segments.en: Your helper, your number one guy.
So, a wingman is someone who helps you a lot.
segments.cn: 所以，wingman是一个非常帮助你的人。

segments.en: Now, this is an interesting word because tie can be a noun, verb, and an adjective, right?
segments.cn: 这是一个有趣的单词，因为tie可以是名词、动词和形容词，对吗？

segments.en: So in this case, they are tied.
segments.cn: 所以在这种情况下，他们是平局。
这是一个形容词，意思是？

segments.en: And a tie is... Is a game that has ended with no winner or loser.
segments.cn: 而平局是... 是一场没有赢家或输家的比赛。

segments.en: Both of them have the same score.
And so obviously, the verb to tie is to reach the same score as your other team.
segments.cn: 所以显然，动词to tie是指与对方球队达到相同的得分。

segments.en: Well, our third word can also be used as a noun and a verb.
segments.cn: 好吧，我们的第三个单词也可以用作名词和动词。

segments.en: Is to do something to them that is not allowed in the sport.
segments.cn: 是对他们做一些在运动中不允许的事情。

segments.en: And so when you do this, you have committed a foul.
segments.cn: 所以当你这样做时，你就犯规了。

segments.en: Okay, so you use it in the same way.
segments.cn: 好的，所以你以同样的方式使用它。

segments.en: Well, we're going to hear these three words in context now.
segments.cn: 好吧，我们现在将听到这三个单词的上下文。

segments.en: So why don't we listen to our soccer dialogue.
segments.cn: 那么我们为什么不听听我们的足球对话呢。

segments.en: And as always, I am joined by my commentating wingman, Bob Copeland.
segments.cn: 一如既往，我的评论助手Bob Copeland与我同在。

segments.en: And we're in the brink of soccer history today as Ecuador and Brazil are tied 1-1 as we begin the second half of the 2022 World Cup.
segments.cn: 今天我们正处于足球历史的边缘，厄瓜多尔和巴西在2022年世界杯的下半场开始时以1-1平局。

segments.en: The ref calls the players for the kickoff.
segments.cn: 裁判召唤球员进行开球。

segments.en: Ecuador quickly passes the ball to the midfield.
segments.cn: 厄瓜多尔迅速将球传给中场。

segments.en: But oh, it's out of bounds.
That'll be a throw in for Brazil.
Adriano has the ball and makes a long pass to Robinho.
And the ref has called him offside.
He was offside by a mile.
We have a goal kick for Ecuador.
segments.cn: 我们有一个厄瓜多尔的球门球。

segments.en: Edison Mendez heads it to Valencia.
And we have a corner kick.
Dita, the goalkeeper, has fouled the Ecuadorian player.
segments.cn: 门将Dita犯规了厄瓜多尔球员。

segments.en: He gets a yellow card and that will be a penalty kick.
segments.cn: 他得到了黄牌，这将是一个点球。

segments.en: This is the perfect opportunity for Ecuador to get ahead in this match and become world champions.
segments.cn: 这是厄瓜多尔在这场比赛中领先并成为世界冠军的绝佳机会。

segments.en: He gets ready for the kick.
Okay, so Ecuador tied with Brazil in the 2022 World Cup.
segments.cn: 好的，厄瓜多尔在2022年世界杯中与巴西平局。

segments.en: Wow, Marco, I'm really happy to see that you are able to see so far into the future.
segments.cn: 哇，Marco，我真的很高兴看到你能看到如此遥远的未来。

segments.en: So in 2022, if we do win the World Cup, you know who set it first.
segments.cn: 所以在2022年，如果我们赢得世界杯，你知道是谁最早说的。

segments.en: Do you have money on that?
So apart from this, we saw some really great vocabulary in this lesson.
segments.cn: 除此之外，我们在这节课中看到了一些非常好的词汇。

segments.en: So let's take a look at it now in language takeaway.
segments.cn: 现在让我们在语言收获中看看它。

segments.en: We've got a lot of soccer words for you, but they're all important.
segments.cn: 我们为你准备了很多足球词汇，但它们都很重要。

segments.en: So let's take a look at the first one.
segments.cn: 所以让我们看看第一个。

segments.en: This is how you start a soccer game, right?
segments.cn: 这就是你开始一场足球比赛的方式，对吗？

segments.en: The referee blows the whistle and you kick the ball to another player.
segments.cn: 裁判吹哨，你把球踢给另一个球员。

segments.en: So our next phrase, out of bounds.
segments.cn: 所以我们的下一个短语，出界。

segments.en: So in soccer, when the ball goes out of bounds, it goes outside the white lines, right?
segments.cn: 所以在足球中，当球出界时，它会超出白线，对吗？

segments.en: And you can use it in all other sports.
segments.cn: 你可以在其他所有运动中使用它。

segments.en: You can use it in basketball.
segments.cn: 你可以在篮球中使用它。

segments.en: You can use it in tennis or football or anything.
segments.cn: 你可以在网球、足球或任何运动中使用它。

segments.en: So any part that is not for playing.
segments.cn: 所以任何不用于比赛的部分。

segments.en: The ball goes out of bounds.
How do you put it back into play?
segments.cn: 你怎么把它重新投入比赛？

segments.en: So you throw in the ball.
That's the only time where a soccer player will actually grab the ball with his hands.
segments.cn: 这是足球运动员唯一一次用手抓球。

segments.en: Now another soccer term we have here.
segments.cn: 现在我们这里有另一个足球术语。

segments.en: Okay, so this is a little bit difficult to explain, but just imagine you're on the soccer field and you are trying to score a goal.
segments.cn: 好的，这有点难以解释，但想象一下你在足球场上，试图进球。

segments.en: Now you have some defenders, right?
segments.cn: 现在你有一些防守队员，对吗？

segments.en: Those are the people who are trying to take the ball away and you pass the ball to somebody who is behind the defenders.
segments.cn: 那些是试图把球抢走的人，你把球传给一个在防守队员后面的人。

segments.en: Oh, and that person is offside.
So you must be at all times in the same position as defenders or in front of them, but you can't be all the way in the back.
segments.cn: 所以你必须始终与防守队员处于同一位置或在他们前面，但不能在后面。

segments.en: So is this a noun or a verb or an adjective?
segments.cn: 那这是名词、动词还是形容词？

segments.en: Now we're going to look at three different phrases for three types of kicks in soccer.
segments.cn: 现在我们要看三种不同的短语，代表足球中的三种踢法。

segments.en: So let's take a look at this.
The first one is goal kick.
So who does the goal kick?
It's usually the goalie or the goalkeeper who takes the goal kick.
segments.cn: 通常是守门员踢球门球。

segments.en: So when the goalie kicks the ball.
Now what about a corner kick?
So if the team is attacking and the ball goes out of bounds in the back area near the goal, then they get a corner kick.
segments.cn: 如果球队在进攻，球在靠近球门的后方出界，那么他们会获得一个角球。

segments.en: They gotta kick the ball from the corner of the field.
segments.cn: 他们必须从场地的角落踢球。

segments.en: This is a great chance to score a goal, isn't it?
segments.cn: 这是一个进球的好机会，不是吗？

segments.en: So if a player gets fouled while he is in the area near the goal.
segments.cn: 所以如果一个球员在靠近球门的区域被犯规。

segments.en: I think it's 13 or 15 steps away from the goalie.
segments.cn: 我想离守门员大约13或15步。

segments.en: And he gets the opportunity to score or to kick the ball.
So there are no defenders or other players in the way.
segments.cn: 所以没有防守队员或其他球员在路上。

segments.en: Another great chance to score a goal.
segments.cn: 又是一个进球的好机会。

segments.en: Well, these are all great soccer words.
segments.cn: 好吧，这些都是很好的足球词汇。

segments.en: I think we should hear them again in context.
segments.cn: 我认为我们应该在上下文中再听一遍。

segments.en: So let's listen this time a little bit slower.
segments.cn: 所以这次我们慢一点听。

segments.en: And as always, I am joined by my commentating wingman, Bob Copeland.
segments.cn: 和往常一样，我的评论搭档鲍勃·科普兰与我同在。

segments.en: And we're on the brink of soccer history today as Ecuador and Brazil are tied 1-1 as we begin the second half of the 2022 World Cup.
segments.cn: 今天我们正处于足球历史的边缘，厄瓜多尔和巴西在2022年世界杯的下半场开始时打成1-1平。

segments.en: The ref calls the players for the kickoff.
segments.cn: 裁判召唤球员进行开球。

segments.en: Ecuador quickly passes the ball to the midfield.
segments.cn: 厄瓜多尔迅速将球传给中场。

segments.en: But oh, it's out of bounds.
That will be a throw in for Brazil.
Adriano has the ball and makes a long pass to Rubinho.
segments.cn: 阿德里亚诺拿到球，长传给鲁比尼奥。

segments.en: And the ref has called him offside.
He was offside by a mile.
We have a goal kick for Ecuador.
segments.cn: 现在有一个厄瓜多尔的球门球。

segments.en: Edison Mendez heads it to Valencia.
segments.cn: 埃迪森·门德斯将球顶给瓦伦西亚。

segments.en: Deflected by the defender and we have a corner kick.
segments.cn: 被后卫挡出，我们获得一个角球。

segments.en: Dida, the goalkeeper, has fouled the Ecuadorian player.
segments.cn: 门将迪达犯规了厄瓜多尔球员。

segments.en: He gets a yellow card and that will be a penalty kick.
segments.cn: 他被出示黄牌，这将是一个点球。

segments.en: This is the perfect opportunity for Ecuador to get ahead in this match and become world champions.
segments.cn: 这是厄瓜多尔在这场比赛中领先并成为世界冠军的绝佳机会。

segments.en: He gets ready for the kick.
Alright, so we heard these words that we were talking about in context.
segments.cn: 好吧，我们听到了这些我们在上下文中讨论的词。

segments.en: And now some really interesting phrases came up and this would be a good time to take a look at them in fluency builder.
segments.cn: 现在一些非常有趣的短语出现了，这将是一个很好的时机来看看它们在流利度构建器中的应用。

segments.en: Well, Marco, there are three great phrases in this dialogue that I want to look at.
segments.cn: 好吧，马尔科，这段对话中有三个很棒的短语我想看看。

segments.en: We are on the brink of.
We're on the brink of soccer history.
segments.cn: 我们在足球历史的边缘。

segments.en: Okay, so on the brink of.
segments.cn: 好的，那么在边缘是什么意思？
好吧，为什么我们不听一些例子来帮助我们理解这个意思。

segments.en: Well, why don't we hear some examples to help us understand the meaning.
We're on the brink of going bankrupt.
The two countries are on the brink of war.
segments.cn: 这两个国家处于战争的边缘。

segments.en: We're on the brink of an important discovery.
segments.cn: 我们在一个重要发现的边缘。

segments.en: It means you're almost there, right?
segments.cn: 这意味着你快到了，对吗？

segments.en: And what about this next phrase that I saw?
segments.cn: 那么我看到的下一个短语呢？

segments.en: Alright, so this is a statement that doesn't really make much sense.
segments.cn: 好吧，这是一种说法，实际上并没有太多意义。

segments.en: But what am I saying when I say, oh, no question about it?
segments.cn: 但是当我说，哦，毫无疑问时，我在说什么？
好吧，让我们举一些例子。

segments.en: I could say there's no question about it.
Ecuador is a great soccer team.
segments.cn: 厄瓜多尔是一支伟大的足球队。

segments.en: There is no question about that.
Alright, so or you can say no question about it.
segments.cn: 好吧，或者你可以说毫无疑问。

segments.en: Our company makes the best products on the market.
segments.cn: 我们公司生产市场上最好的产品。

segments.en: Okay, so really useful phrase that you can use in sports or anywhere else.
segments.cn: 好的，所以这是一个非常有用的短语，你可以在体育或其他任何地方使用。

segments.en: Okay, and now let's take a look at our last phrase for Fluency Builder.
segments.cn: 好的，现在让我们看看流利度构建器的最后一个短语。

segments.en: And it's a really good one to exaggerate a little bit.
segments.cn: 这是一个非常好的短语，可以稍微夸张一下。

segments.en: So he was offside by a mile.
Right, so the commentator is saying that he was very offside.
segments.cn: 对，所以评论员说他越位了很多。

segments.en: So you can use that also in different contexts, maybe not in sports.
segments.cn: 所以你也可以在不同的上下文中使用这个，可能不在体育中。

segments.en: Okay, so maybe we can say our company is ahead of all the others by a mile.
segments.cn: 好的，所以也许我们可以说我们的公司远远领先于所有其他公司。

segments.en: Or if you tell somebody to guess your age and they say, oh, I think you are 42.
segments.cn: 或者如果你让某人猜你的年龄，他们说，哦，我觉得你42岁。

segments.en: Oh, you could say you're off by a mile.
segments.cn: 哦，你可以说你错得离谱。

segments.en: So it's a way of exaggerating a little bit.
segments.cn: 所以这是一种稍微夸张的方式。

segments.en: Yes, and saying it's really obvious.
segments.cn: 是的，表示这真的很明显。

segments.en: And I think it will help us to hear them one more time.
segments.cn: 我认为再听一遍会对我们有帮助。

segments.en: So let's listen to the dialogue.
And as always, I am joined by my commentating wingman, Bob Copeland.
segments.cn: 一如既往，我的评论搭档鲍勃·科普兰与我同在。

segments.en: And we're in the brink of soccer history today as Ecuador and Brazil are tied 1-1 as we begin the second half of the 2022 World Cup.
segments.cn: 今天我们即将见证足球历史，厄瓜多尔和巴西的比分是1-1，第二场2022年世界杯的下半场即将开始。

segments.en: The ref calls the players for the kickoff.
segments.cn: 裁判召唤球员准备开球。

segments.en: Ecuador quickly passes the ball to the midfield, but oh, it's out of bounds.
segments.cn: 厄瓜多尔迅速将球传到中场，但哦，出界了。

segments.en: That'll be a throw in for Brazil.
Adriano has the ball and makes a long pass to Robinho.
segments.cn: 阿德里亚诺拿到球，长传给罗比尼奥。

segments.en: And the ref has called him offside.
He was offside by a mile.
We have a goal kick for Ecuador.
segments.cn: 我们有一个厄瓜多尔的球门球。

segments.en: Edison Mendez heads it to Valencia.
segments.cn: 埃迪森·门德斯将球顶给瓦伦西亚。

segments.en: He shoots deflected by the defender and we have a corner kick.
segments.cn: 他射门被防守球员挡出，我们获得一个角球。

segments.en: Dita, the goalkeeper, has fouled the Ecuadorian player.
segments.cn: 门将迪塔犯规了厄瓜多尔球员。

segments.en: He gets a yellow card and that will be a penalty kick.
segments.cn: 他得到了黄牌，这将是一个点球。

segments.en: This is the perfect opportunity for Ecuador to get ahead in this match and become world champions.
segments.cn: 这是厄瓜多尔在这场比赛中领先并成为世界冠军的绝佳机会。

segments.en: He gets ready for the kick.
Okay, well, as you all may know, soccer is a very popular sport, especially in Latin America.
segments.cn: 好吧，正如大家所知，足球是一项非常受欢迎的运动，尤其是在拉丁美洲。

segments.en: And your favorite team, Ecuador, are they really this good in soccer?
segments.cn: 你最喜欢的球队，厄瓜多尔，他们真的这么擅长足球吗？

segments.en: Are they really going to win the 2022 cup?
segments.cn: 他们真的会赢得2022年世界杯吗？

segments.en: Well, actually Ecuador has improved with time, but usually it's the strong teams like Argentina and Brazil who dominate the region, right?
segments.cn: 其实厄瓜多尔随着时间的推移有所进步，但通常是阿根廷和巴西这样的强队主导这个地区，对吧？

segments.en: But yeah, hopefully we'll make it next time.
Okay, well, I have my money on Ecuador and for 2022.
segments.cn: 好吧，我把我的钱押在厄瓜多尔和2022年。

segments.en: Well, Canada is doing really well now.
segments.cn: 其实，加拿大现在表现得很好。

segments.en: They actually beat Mexico, if I'm not mistaken.
segments.cn: 如果我没记错的话，他们击败了墨西哥。

segments.en: Oh, actually that sort of... Yeah, I kind of remember that now.
segments.cn: 哦，实际上我有点... 是的，我现在有点记得了。

segments.en: But I think there's no hope for us to beat Brazil or Argentina, one of these big countries.
segments.cn: 但我认为我们没有希望击败巴西或阿根廷这样的强国。

segments.en: We have the next World Cup coming up, so it's really exciting and I don't know who's going to win.
segments.cn: 我们即将迎来下一届世界杯，真令人兴奋，我不知道谁会赢。

segments.en: Well, listeners, who do you think is going to win?
segments.cn: 听众们，你们认为谁会赢？

segments.en: Who is the best soccer team out there?
segments.cn: 哪支球队是最好的足球队？

segments.en: They're really good soccer teams, although some of our... some countries aren't really known for their soccer, like Russia.
segments.cn: 他们确实是很好的足球队，尽管我们的一些... 一些国家并不以足球闻名，比如俄罗斯。

segments.en: You don't really hear too much soccer from Russia.
segments.cn: 你并不常听到俄罗斯的足球。

segments.en: Or from China is for that.
I wonder how popular it is in these countries.
segments.cn: 我想知道在这些国家足球有多受欢迎。

segments.en: Tell us how popular soccer is in your country or what team you are a fan of.
segments.cn: 告诉我们足球在你们国家有多受欢迎，或者你支持哪个球队。

segments.en: I know many people like the European Cups and they are fans of Barcelona or the Italian teams.
segments.cn: 我知道很多人喜欢欧洲杯，他们是巴萨或意大利球队的球迷。

segments.en: Marco and I are always around to answer your questions.
segments.cn: 马尔科和我总是在这里回答你们的问题。
